titleInfo.title: Die Gewinnung korrekter Daten aus manuellen Aufschreibungen - Empirische Ermittlung eines Erfassungssystems.

mods.abstract: Collecting effort data is a strongly neglected problem of every day’s practice and research. The development, design and application concept of a system for manual effort collection is presented. Research methodology calls such a system a measurement tool, which has to realize the correctness requirements on the data. Examples of results from a database produced by 40 developers in five locations over 6½ years are showed.

bibliographicCitation.apa: Spitta, T. (1997). Die Gewinnung korrekter Daten aus manuellen Aufschreibungen - Empirische Ermittlung eines Erfassungssystems. In O. Grün & L. J. Heinrich (Eds.), Empirische Forschung in der Wirtschaftsinformatik (pp. 105-118). Wien - New York: Springer.
